short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Browser Extension for Kopy that allows easier importing directly from Shopify stores.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Kopy is an app that allows you to copy easily products from any store to your store in 1 click.

Why waste your time manually copying and pasting? Insert the URL of your desired product, collection or store to copy products from and you'll save a LOT of time getting ALL the Titles, Images, Descriptions, Variants, Prices, Compare at price and SEO info copied into your store in a matter of seconds.

⚡️ Highlights:

✔️ Copy & import products from any store in 1 click.

✔️ Import products individually or massively.

✔️ Edit product before importing.

✔️ Select the products variants to import.

✔️ Select multiple products to import to your store.

Have any questions or feedback? Please get in touch with us at contact@llcversus.com.
